Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Out of curiosity did anyone see that video?  I posted where questions  were 
asked regarding life after death and all the voice responses I got?  I  
thought it was a good one, because of all the responses I received.
 
_http://www.youtube.com/user/Snowfirel?feature=mhee_ 
(http://www.youtube.com/user/Snowfirel?feature=mhee) 
 
The question was asked, Is there life after death, and I got all kinds of  
affirmative answers. At 0.05 sec. "I'm Alive" 0.15 "There must be" 0.16 
"faith"  At: 0.27 "mucho" "yes" 0.31 "Yes" 0.34 "Praise Him" 0.35 "Bonnie" 0.53 
"yes" at  0.53 "you'll see"  Then I hear a childs voice at 0.99 say either, 
"Jacob or  wake up" At 1.03 sec. I hear, "has to be" at 1.09 "they'll be" At 
1.27 "Mc  Donald"  at 1.44 "hi"  at 1.48 "on the floor" at 2.29 "I was 
hoping"  "yep" I asked r u on a lower plain, that's when I hear "yes."  At 3.26 
I  hear name, Howard, powerful then at 3.54 "clear it for Ms Stebbins" at 
3.56 I  hear my mother's voice call my name"Bonnie" at 4.00 I hear, "they see  
themselves" I had my cam close to the ghost box, so it made a reflection. 
At  4.21 "I"ll say" then they answer my other question, when I asked them how 
long  the line was going from the low plains of darkness toward the light, 
they say at  4.24 "54 miles,  it is long"   then it's long that I get at 
4.42  "they will come" at 4.52 :what's up?" "Hi" then I got some names, at  
5.10  "pushing back here" at 5.23 "Walt, Frank, Herbie"  and when I go to close 
 down, I got at 5.46 "love you" "love you"  at 5.57 "Rick save me a  place" 
  They tell me that I just got started with the session at,  6.12 At 6.23 I 
hear my mother's voice again, calling out my name, "  Bonnie"  Upon closing 
the session, I hear, at 6.46 "we love  ya"  

--part1_f0b4.6f6d852a.3afffd25_boundary
